Key Match Events: Mohammad Amir took 2-13 in his comeback international match.
Mohammad Rizwan scored an unbeaten 45 off 34 balls.
Ben Lister made a spectacular two-handed diving catch to dismiss Saim Ayub.
New Zealand was bowled out for 90 runs, their second lowest T20 total against Pakistan.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam praised the bowling performance of Naseem, Shaheen, and Amir.
New Zealand skipper Michael Bracewell acknowledged their struggle to adapt to the surface and the need to learn quickly for the next game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rawalpindi will host the third game on Sunday, and the series will move to Lahore for the remaining games on April 25 and 27.
